Title: AI on the Go for Microsoft Partners: Manufacturing
Author: Microsoft Cloud
Description:
Welcome back to "AI on the Go for Microsoft Partners," your go-to series for exploring the latest trends in artificial intelligence! In this episode, host Cyril Belikoff delves into how AI is transforming industrials and manufacturing. From engineering innovations to the factory floor, hear from Microsoft CVP Dayan Rodriguez on what the latest AI opportunities are and how partners are making more possible.

Check out more episodes here: https://msft.it/6054SP2Ei

Don't miss out on this exciting journey into the future of manufacturing! Subscribe to our channel and hit the notification bell to stay updated on all things AI!

#Microsoft #MicrosoftCloud
